      • RealServerProxy

        public RealServerProxy(java.lang.String server_host,
                       int server_port)
        Sets up connection with the server with specified parameters
        Parameters:
        server_host - this string represents the hostname of the server
        server_port - this int is the port to send requests to on the server

        public boolean loginUser(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws ServerProxyException
        Description copied from interface: JSONServerProxy
        Logs the specified user in and returns a User object if the user was successfully logged in. If not, a null user is returned
        Specified by:
        loginUser in interface JSONServerProxy
        Specified by:
        loginUser in interface ServerProxy
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to log in
        password - The password of the user to log in
        Returns:
        boolean true when the user could be logged in, false when he couldn't
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - if the user could not be logged in

        Creates a game on the server
        Specified by:
        createGame in interface JSONServerProxy
        Specified by:
        createGame in interface ServerProxy
        Parameters:
        randomTiles - Whether the server should place random tiles
        randomNumbers - Whether the server should place random number chits
        randomPorts - Whether the server should place random ports

        Returns:
        a ProxyGame object that represents the game that was created

        ServerProxyException - if something goes wrong

      • offerTrade

        public NetGameModel offerTrade(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> resourceList,
                               int receiver)
                        throws ServerProxyException
        Description copied from interface: JSONServerProxy
        Notifies the server that the user has decided to offer a trade to another player
        Specified by:
        offerTrade in interface JSONServerProxy
        Specified by:
        offerTrade in interface ServerProxy
        Parameters:
        resourceList - A list of the resources that the user wishes to trade, in this order: brick, ore, sheep, wheat, and wood. Negative values denotes that this user will give these resources, and positive values denote the resources that will be received
        receiver - The index of the player who will receive this trade offer
        Returns:
        a NetGameModel object that reflects the current state of the Game
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - if there is no logged in user

        public NetGameModel acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)

        Specified by:
        acceptTrade in interface JSONServerProxy
        Specified by:
        acceptTrade in interface ServerProxy
        Parameters:
        willAccept - true if the user will accept the trade, false if not
        Returns:
        a NetGameModel object that reflects the current state of the Game
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - if there is no logged in user

      • maritimeTrade

        public NetGameModel maritimeTrade(int ratio,
                                  ResourceType inputResource,
                                  ResourceType outputResource)
                           throws ServerProxyException
        Description copied from interface: JSONServerProxy
        Notifies the server that the user has decided to initiate a maritime trade
        Specified by:
        maritimeTrade in interface JSONServerProxy
        Specified by:
        maritimeTrade in interface ServerProxy
        Parameters:
        ratio - The ratio of resources demanded by the harbor
        inputResource - The resources traded away
        outputResource - The resource received
        Returns:
        a NetGameModel object that reflects the current state of the Game
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - if there is no logged in user

      • discardCards

        public NetGameModel discardCards(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> resourceList)
                          throws ServerProxyException
        Description copied from interface: JSONServerProxy
        Notifies the server that the user has discarded cards
        Specified by:
        discardCards in interface JSONServerProxy
        Specified by:
        discardCards in interface ServerProxy
        Parameters:
        resourceList - A list of integers that denotes how many of each resource the user will discard. The order is brick, ore, sheep, wheat, and wood
        Returns:
        a NetGameModel object that reflects the current state of the Game
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - if there is no logged in user
